message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA. 

The paper proposes a framework for selecting the best reinforcement learning agent for a given environment, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of surrogate rewards to alleviate the problem of sparse rewards suggests a focus on robotics (cs.RO) or control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the use of a multi-arm bandit framework suggests a focus on optimization (cs.MA).
